description.narrative: The Executive Committee approved the preparation funding for the Stage II of the HPMP for Malawi at its 81st Meeting in June 2018, and further approved the first tranche of the Stage II of the HPMP for Malawi for the period 2021-2025 at its 85th Meeting in July 2020. HPMP Phase-out commitment of the Stage II is 67.5% by 2025. The Ministry of Ministry of Environment <(>&<)> Climate Change Management is the national body to implement the Montreal Protocol in the country. The National Ozone Unit (NOU) has been established within the ministry as a dedicated unit to implement the country#s obligations under the Vienna Convention and Montreal protocol. The National Ozone Committee is set up to guide on implementation of Montreal Protocol programmes. UN Environment (lead implementing agency) and UNIDO (co-operating implementing agency) jointly implement the project with the support of the NOU. The HPMP Stage II project will promote the adoption of alternative technologies to HCFCs which have low or zero GWP such as hydrocarbon # based refrigerants. The HPMP Stage-II is expected to phase-out a total of 101.2 metric tons of HCFCs used in the RAC servicing sector.
